item.title: How do i make a
item.dc:creator: @_Vengeance _Vengeance
item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

[quote=“trevor268, post:1, topic:181553”]how do i make a place where u fight and when u die u dont lose items? ive got this added and when i compile i dont have any errors but i still lost stuff??

public boolean loseNoItems() {
if((absX >=3090 && absX <=3424 && absY >=3096 && absY <=3530 ) ||
heightLevel == 1)
return true;
else
return false;
}[/quote]

Are you making a call to that method before you die?

item.title: How do i make a
item.dc:creator: @trevor268 trevor268
item.description:
@trevor268 wrote:

how do i make a place where u fight and when u die u dont lose items? ive got this added and when i compile i dont have any errors but i still lost stuff??

public boolean loseNoItems() {
if((absX >=3090 && absX <=3424 && absY >=3096 && absY <=3530 ) ||
heightLevel == 1)
return true;
else
return false;
}

Read full topic
